descript.abstract: Primary productivity data along Line P and Station P for Sept 1999, and March and June 2000. Chlorophyll, primary productivity, chlorophyll fluorescence, photosynthetically active radiation, and phytoplankton abundance and biomass were measured.
descript.purpose: Assessing the variability of primary production along Line P, constructing models to predict parameters of phytoplankton population and biomass.
descript.supplinf: Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre . Risk of Loss: Medium Impact Justification: Time series of less than 5 years. Impact of Loss: Low Recommended Action: Obtain access to data and bring to archives

idinfo.useconst: Will be made accessible once the data are verified.
